system.description:
A pre-War breakfast cereal with “explosive great taste”, the box contains little cereal shapes resembling stylized atomic bombs coated in copious amounts of sugar. Some boxes claim to contain a prize inside.

Sometimes, preserved boxes of Sugar Bombs can be found. These are identical to the listed version, but are not irradiated, and increase their rarity by +1.
system.effect: Gain +1 AP at start of next scene
